snippet.title: Yaga - The Roleplaying Folktale
snippet.description:
Yaga is an Action RPG with a charming narrative that adapts to your choices, exploring the enchanted world of slavic culture and folklore.

Play as a one-handed blacksmith caught between the jealous Tzar giving impossible tasks and the ancient Witch protecting the supernatural world.

Enter the gloomy world of Eastern European folklore and mythology, rich with deadly creatures, charming characters and lots of secrets!

Music by Subcarpati and Argatu'

Follow the game on our website: https://breadcrumbsinteractive.com/
